00053 //----------------------------------------------------------
00054 bool
00055 MSphere::Intersect( const MSphere& sphere ) const
00056 {
00057         float maxDistSqr = _radius + sphere.GetRadius();
00058         maxDistSqr *= maxDistSqr;
00059         return ( _center.DistSqr( sphere.GetCenter() ) < maxDistSqr );
00060 }
00061 
00062 //----------------------------------------------------------
00063 bool
00064 MSphere::IsInside( const MSphere& sphere ) const
00065 {
00066         return ( ( _center.Dist( sphere.GetCenter() ) + sphere.GetRadius() ) < _radius );
00067 }
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------
00070 void
00071 MSphere::SetRadius( float radius )
00072 {
00073 //      B_ASSERT( radius > 0.0f );
00074         _radius = radius;
00075 }
00076 
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------
00078 int
00079 MSphere::GetSide( const MPlane& plane ) const
00080 {
00081         float dist = plane.Dist( _center );
00082         if ( Abs( dist ) > _radius )
00083                 return dist >= 0.0f ? 1 : -1;
00084         return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 int
00089 MSphere::GetSection( const MPlane& plane, MVec3& center, float& radius ) const
00090 {
00093         float dist = plane.Dist( _center );
00094         if ( Abs( dist ) > _radius )
00095                 return dist > 0.0f ? 1 : -1;
00096 
00098         radius = Sqrt( _radius*_radius - dist*dist );
00099 
00101         center = _center - dist * plane.GetNormal();
00102 
00104         return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------
00108 void
00109 MSphere::Transform( MSphere& sphere, const MMat4x4& transform ) const
00110 {
00111         MVec3 scales;
00112         transform.GetScaleSqr( scales );
00113 
00115         sphere.SetRadius( Sqrt( scales.Max() ) * _radius );
00116 
00118         sphere.SetCenter( transform.TransformCoord( _center ) );
00119 }
00120 
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------
00122 void
00123 MSphere::TransformFast( const MMat4x4& transform )
00124 {
00125         MVec3 scales;
00126         transform.GetScaleSqr( scales );
00127 
00129         _radius = Sqrt( scales.Max() ) * _radius;
00130 
00132         transform.TransformCoordFast( _center );
00133 }
00134 
00135 //----------------------------------------------------------
00136 void
00137 MSphere::Save( UWriter& writer ) const
00138 {
00139         _center.Save( writer );
00140         writer.WriteFloat( _radius );
00141 }

00143 //----------------------------------------------------------
00144 void
00145 MSphere::Load( UReader& reader )
00146 {
00147         _center.Load( reader );
00148         _radius = reader.ReadFloat();
00149 }
